VIA - Volumetric Image Analysis File List

Here is a list of all documented files with brief descriptions:
Curvature.c
plaintov.cPlaintov - converts file from Vista plain format to Vista format
pnmtov.cPnmtov - convert portable anymap (PNM) image to Vista data file
rawtov.cRawtov - converts a raw data file to Vista format
SoftKMeans.c
vaniso2d.cVaniso2d -- 2D anisotropic diffusion
vaniso3d.cVaniso3d -- 3D anisotropic diffusion
vbinarize.cVbinarize -- threshold an image
vbinmorph3d.cVbinmorph3d -- 3D binary morphology
vcanny2d.cVcanny2d -- 2D edge detection
vcanny3d.cVcanny3d -- 3D edge detection
vcat.cVcat - concatenates Vista data files
vcatbands.cVcatbands - concatenate image bands into a single image
vcontrast.cVcontrast -- contrast enhancement
vconvolve2d.cVconvolve2d -- 2D convolution filter
vconvolve3d.cVconvolve3d -- 3D convolution filter
vcrop.cVcrop - crops an image
vcurvature.cVcurvature -- 3d curvature computations
vdelsmall.cVdelsmall -- delete small components in a labelled image
vderiche3d.cVderiche3d - 3D Deriche edge detection
vdist3d.cVdist3d -- 3D distance transform
vflip.cVflip - performs one or more flip operations
vgauss2d.cVgauss2d - 2D Gauss filter
vgauss3d.cVgauss3d - 3D Gauss filter
vgenus3d.cVgenus3d - 3D Euler characteristic
vgreymorph3d.cVgreymorph3d -- 3D greylevel morphology
vhemi.cVhemi -- select one hemisphere
vicp.cVicp -- 3D point set registration
vimage2graph.cVimage2graph - convert a raster image to graph representation
vimage2volumes.cVimage2volumes - convert a raster image to volume representation
vimagehisto.cVimagehisto - display the image histogram
vinvert.cVinvert - inverts an image
visodata.cVisodata - isodata clustering
vistat.cVistat - report image statistics
vkernel2d.cVkernel2d - construct convolution kernels
vlabel2d.cVlabel2d - 2D connected component labelling
vlabel3d.cVlabel3d - 3D connected component labelling
vmedian3d.cVmedian3d - 3D median filter
volumes2image.cVolumes2image - converts a volume set into a raster image
volumeselect.cVolumeselect - select volumes from a set of volumes
vop.cVop - perform arithmetic and logical operations on images
vquickmorph3d.cVquickmorph3d - 3D morphological operators using distance transforms
vrotate.cVrotate - rotate an image by an arbitrary angle
vscale2d.cVscale2d - 2D scaling
vscale3d.cVscale3d - 3D scaling
vselbands.cVselbands -- select slices from an image
vselbig.cVselbig - select largest component in a labelled image
vselect.cVselect - select objects from an input file
vskel2d.cVskel2d - 2D skeletonization
vskel3d.cVskel3d - 3D skeletonization
vsmooth3d.cVsmooth3d - perform 3d smoothing filter
vsynth.cVsynth - produce a synthetic image
vthin3d.cVthin3d - 3D topological thinning
vtopgm.cVtopgm - convert image from Vista data file to portable graymap
vtopoclass.cVtopoclass - topological classification
